nodes.text: The Clone Wars: The Holocron Heist

The Clone Wars: The Holocron Heist is a young-readers book written by Rob Valois and published by Grosset & Dunlap on September 3, 2009. It is based on the premiere episode of the same name of Season Two of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series.

The ruthless bounty hunter Cad Bane infiltrates the Jedi Temple and attempts to steal the Order's most guarded secret. It's up to Anakin and Ahsoka to stop Bane before he can use the secret to bring an end to the Jedi forever.
